Dimension Reduction Dice.name: Dimension Reduction Dice
Dimension Reduction Dice.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, #1[i] extra Blessing(s) can be chosen, but the number of available Blessings will be reduced by #2[i]. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered #3[i] times.

Chaos Trametes.name: Chaos Trametes
Chaos Trametes.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, increase the number of free Blessing resets by #1[i].

Warping Compound Eye.name: Warping Compound Eye
Warping Compound Eye.desc: When choosing a Blessing after winning a battle, level up all 1-star Blessings that appear.

Fruit of the Alien Tree.name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
Fruit of the Alien Tree.desc: After winning a battle, revive all downed characters in the current team and restore their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered #1[i] times.

Casket of Inaccuracy.name: Casket of Inaccuracy
Casket of Inaccuracy.desc: Gains #1[i]â€“#2[i] random Blessings after obtaining this Curio.

Ambergris Cheese.name: Ambergris Cheese
Ambergris Cheese.desc: After winning a battle, all allies restore HP equal to #1[i]% of their respective Max HP.

Fortune Glue.name: Fortune Glue
Fortune Glue.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, all Blessings that appear are guaranteed to be of 3-star rarity. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered #1[i] times.

The Parchment That Always Eats.name: The Parchment That Always Eats
The Parchment That Always Eats.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies receive DMG equal to #1[i]% of their respective Max HP.

The Doctor's Robe.name: The Doctor's Robe
The Doctor's Robe.desc: Upon entering battle, regenerates Path Resonance Energy to max and increases Path Resonance DMG by #1[i]%.

Society Ticket.name: Society Ticket
Society Ticket.desc: Increases the number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle by #1[i]%.

Faith Bond.name: Faith Bond
Faith Bond.desc: Reduces the Cosmic Fragments required for leveling up Blessings, resetting Blessings, and resetting downed characters by #1[i]%.

Robe of The Beauty.name: Robe of The Beauty
Robe of The Beauty.desc: Upon entering battle, increases DMG dealt by all allies by #2[i]% for every #1[i] Cosmic Fragment(s) you own.

Gold Coin of Discord.name: Gold Coin of Discord
Gold Coin of Discord.desc: Each time you enter the following domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to #1[i]% of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

Void Wick Trimmer.name: Void Wick Trimmer
Void Wick Trimmer.desc: After obtaining this Curio, randomly repairs up to #1[i] destroyed Curio(s) and restores their remaining uses to default.

Record from Beyond the Sky.name: Record from Beyond the Sky
Record from Beyond the Sky.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after they are attacked, and cannot be debuffed for #2[i] turn(s).

Entropic Die.name: Entropic Die
Entropic Die.desc: Randomly levels up #1[i] Blessing(s) after obtaining this Curio.

Shining Trapezohedron Die.name: Shining Trapezohedron Die
Shining Trapezohedron Die.desc: Replaces all Curios currently in possession (including this Curio) with random Curios.

Sealing Wax of Preservation.name: Sealing Wax of Preservation
Sealing Wax of Preservation.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Preservation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Preservation to appear.

Sealing Wax of Elation.name: Sealing Wax of Elation
Sealing Wax of Elation.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Elation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Elation to appear.

Sealing Wax of The Hunt.name: Sealing Wax of The Hunt
Sealing Wax of The Hunt.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of The Hunt after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of The Hunt to appear.

Sealing Wax of Destruction.name: Sealing Wax of Destruction
Sealing Wax of Destruction.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Destruction after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Destruction to appear.

Sealing Wax of Remembrance.name: Sealing Wax of Remembrance
Sealing Wax of Remembrance.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Remembrance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Remembrance to appear.

Sealing Wax of Nihility.name: Sealing Wax of Nihility
Sealing Wax of Nihility.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Nihility after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Nihility to appear.

Sealing Wax of Abundance.name: Sealing Wax of Abundance
Sealing Wax of Abundance.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Abundance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Abundance to appear.

Corrupted Code.name: Corrupted Code
Corrupted Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses all their Energy when they Break enemy Weaknesses.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio regenerates characters' Energy.
Corrupted Code.fixedDesc: When a character Breaks enemy Weaknesses, they regenerate #1[i] Energy.

Odd Code.name: Odd Code
Odd Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses #1[i]% of their current HP every time they use their Ultimate.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio restores HP for characters.
Odd Code.fixedDesc: Every time a character uses their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to #1[i]% of their Max HP.

Normal Code.name: Normal Code
Normal Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, allies take #2[i]% more DMG while their HP percentage is below #1[i]% of their Max HP.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio reduces DMG taken by allies.
Normal Code.fixedDesc: Characters receive #2[i]% less DMG while their HP percentage is below #1[i]% of their Max HP.

Elegant Code.name: Elegant Code
Elegant Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a random enemy's action will be Advanced Forward by #1[i]% every time a character uses a Skill.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio Advances Forward characters' actions.
Elegant Code.fixedDesc: After a character uses a Skill, their next action will be advanced forward by #1[i]%.

Mysterious Code.name: Mysterious Code
Mysterious Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, enemies deal #1[i]% more DMG when another enemy unit is defeated by a character.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio increases DMG dealt by all allies.
Mysterious Code.fixedDesc: All allies deal #1[i]% more DMG after an enemy is defeated.

Infinitely Recursive Code.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
Infinitely Recursive Code.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, each time after a character uses a Skill, they consume #1[i] extra Skill Points.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio makes characters' Basic ATK recover extra Skill Points.
Infinitely Recursive Code.fixedDesc: Recovers #1[i] extra Skill Point(s) when characters use Basic ATK.

Shattered Star Bait.name: Shattered Star Bait
Shattered Star Bait.desc: Increase Movement SPD by #1[i]% when in map. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by #2[i]% after they take action.

Obliteration Wick Trimmer.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer
Obliteration Wick Trimmer.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all allies' DMG by #1[i]% for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

Insect Web.name: Insect Web
Insect Web.desc: Upon entering battle, the character currently with the highest ATK will become Parasitized. While Parasitized, the character's ATK increases by #1[i]%, but will lose HP equal to #2[i]% of their current HP at the start of every turn. When this character is knocked down, Parasitized will be transferred to a random character.

Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser
Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect #1[i] times, this Curio will be destroyed and the amount of Cosmic Fragment(s) currently held will be doubled.

Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts.name: Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts
Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts.desc: The current exploration will not terminate if your team is defeated in a non-boss battle. Instead, the battle will be considered as a victory, and all characters will recover HP up to their respective Max HP. After triggering this effect #1[i] time(s), this Curio will be destroyed.

Space-Time Prism.name: Space-Time Prism
Space-Time Prism.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all ally's Eidolon Resonance level by #1[i].

Galactic Big Lotto.name: Galactic Big Lotto
Galactic Big Lotto.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 Curio, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and all characters losing #1[i]% of their current HP.

Omniscient Capsule.name: Omniscient Capsule
Omniscient Capsule.desc: Destructible objects will appear more frequently and rewards obtained from them are doubled.

Divination Cuckoo Clock.name: Divination Cuckoo Clock
Divination Cuckoo Clock.desc: When selecting Blessings after victory, the number of available Blessings will be reduced by #1[i].

Black Forest Cuckoo Clock.name: Black Forest Cuckoo Clock
Black Forest Cuckoo Clock.desc: Upon entering battle, randomly increases the chance for #1[i] character(s) to be attacked by enemies for #2[i] turn(s).

Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock.name: Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock
Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock.desc: Each time you enter the following domain, lose #1[i]% of all Cosmic Fragment(s) currently in your possession.

Punklorde Mentality.name: Punklorde Mentality
Punklorde Mentality.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a #1[i]% fixed chance to add to all enemies #2[i] Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as allies currently on the field. These Weakness(es) last(s) for #3[i] turn(s).

Beacon Coloring Paste.name: Beacon Coloring Paste
Beacon Coloring Paste.desc: When choosing a Blessing after winning a battle, randomly level up #1[i] Blessing(s) among the selection.

IPC Cuckoo Clock.name: IPC Cuckoo Clock
IPC Cuckoo Clock.desc: Cosmic Fragments required to level up and reset Blessings increase by #1[i]%.

Mechanical Cuckoo Clock.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
Mechanical Cuckoo Clock.desc: Upon entering battle, consume #1[i] Skill Point.
